Title: Those Happy Days
Actors: Jean-Paul Rouve, Marilou Berry, Omar Sy, Lannick Gautry
Plot: A genuine and often funny depiction of the relationships between monitors and children in a summer vacation camp. From romance to friendship, dancing to fighting, this French movie bring back good souvenirs of childhood.
Production: M6 Métropole Télévision, La Petite Reine, Département de la Charente, M6 Films, Région Poitou-Charentes, Quad Productions, SND Films, TPS Star
